description: This modern Business Class hotel is on the elegant Kaerntner Strasse and provides the highest level of comfort in all 160 rooms and suites. The range of services is completed by the noble Europa Bar, a popular meeting place for locals as well as international guests.iHotelier/iStay

name: Adina Apartment Hotel Vienna Belvedere
description: Adina Apartment Hotel Vienna Belvedere provides comfortable 4-star accommodation in Vienna. It has a fitness centre, as well as a sauna, a swimming pool and free Wi-Fi. The hotel provides luggage storage and a 24-hour reception. It is dog-friendly and has private parking on site for those travelling with a car. The rooms at Adina Apartment Hotel Vienna Belvedere are air conditioned and soundproofed for guest comfort. For guests who wish to cook their own meals, there is a kitchen that is conveniently equipped with a dishwasher, a microwave and a refrigerator. Those staying at Adina Apartment Hotel Vienna Belvedere can relax at the in-house bar, ideally located for a drink. The hotel is close to Sudtiroler Platz-Hauptbahnhof, making it easy for guests to explore Vienna and its surrounding areas. The Schloss Belvedere and the Osterreichische Galerie Belvedere are a short walk away.Revato

name: arte Hotel Wien Stadthalle
description: The non-smoking arte Hotel Wien Stadthalle is only a 1-minute walk from the Stadthalle, the city´s premier exhibition and concert hall. The Burggasse/Stadthalle U6 Underground Station and trams 6 and 18 are only 130 metres away. Free unlimited WiFi, a 24-hour front desk and bar are available. arte Hotel Wien Stadthalle offers bright, soundproof and air-conditioned rooms with cable TV, a work desk, a minibar and parquet flooring. The private bathrooms have a hairdryer and some rooms are facing the inner courtyard. The buffet breakfast at the arte Hotel consists of various sweet and savoury dishes, as well as fresh coffee and juices. Guests can enjoy a drink at the stylish bar or the in the fancy courtyard, decorated with a graffiti showing famous music artists. Billiards can be played as well. The Lugner City shopping and entertainment centre is next to the hotel. The Mariahilfer-Straße Shopping Boulevard is 1 metro stop away, while the März Park is next to the hotel. By public transport, the hotel is 15 minutes from the city centre. The Westbahnhof Train Station is a 10-minute walk away.

name: Hampton by Hilton Vienna Messe
description: Hampton by Hilton Vienna Messe, a new hotel presented in style of Hampton's new generation, offers 192 Rooms, free breakfast, meeting facilities (23 sqm) and a fitness area on the 7th Floor. The hotel is situated next to the Exhibition Center "Read Messe", the Football Stadio "Ernst Happel Stadium" and the famous "Prater" (entertainment area). Public transports are reachable in a few minutes walking distance. A public garage is situated directly at the hotel.Hilton

name: Boutiquehotel Stadthalle
description: Boutiquehotel Stadthalle is a family-run and eco-friendly hotel with a beautiful garden, individually designed rooms, and free WiFi. It is just an 8-minute walk from the Westbahnhof Train Station and Vienna’s main shopping boulevard Mariahilfer Straße. An organic buffet breakfast including local products is served in the breakfast room, in the sun-flooded winter garden, or outdoors in the unique green oasis. Boutiquehotel Stadthalle's water is heated by solar panels, and rainwater collected from the roof is used to water the garden. Moreover, all roofs are planted. There is a bicycle trail leading straight to the centre of Vienna from the hotel. A bicycle garage is available free of charge, and bicycles can be rented out at the hotel the whole year. The Westbahnhof Underground Station (lines U3 and U6) provides direct connections to the city centre. From the nearby Beingasse Tram Stop, you can also get quickly to the city centre, as well as to the picturesque Spittelberg area. From another nearby tram stop, Schönbrunn Palace is reachable within just a few minutes. Vienna's Main Train Station (Hauptbahnhof) can be easily reached in 15 minutes by tram line 18.

name: Parks 73 The Townhouse Hotel
description: Parks73 The Townhouse Hotel is located in Vienna, less than 1 km from the Belvedere Palace and a 10-minute tram ride from the city centre. Boasting a garden and a terrace, this aparthotel features parking and complimentary WiFi. All rooms and apartments face the courtyard and are fitted with air conditioning, a fully equipped kitchen, a dining area, as well as a flat-screen TV, and most of them also come with a balcony or terrace. The private bathrooms offer free toiletries, a hair dryer and a bathtub or shower. The hotel bar serves a variety of local wines as well as freshly roasted coffee, and guests can also relax in the shared lounge area. Vienna International Airport is 18 km away and can be reached within 30 minutes by public transport. The aparthotel is situated 2.2 km from Vienna Main Station.

name: grätzlhotel Karmelitermarkt
description: Located in different locations in the trendy neighbourhood around the Karmeliter Market in Vienna’s second district, Graetzlhotel Karmelitermarkt is a 5-minute walk from the Taborstraße Underground Station (line U2). Free WiFi is available. The spacious, individually furnished suites are located in former workshops and stores. They are air-conditioned and come with a private entrance, TV, seating area, kitchenette, and bathroom. A key safe is situated in front of the premises and guests can easily check-in with a key code, provided at least 2 days prior to arrival. The Risottobox Restaurant is close by and the staff there is also providing insider tips for Vienna.

name: Pension Suzanne
description: No description found

name: Vienna Marriott Hotel
description: Experience Austrias beautiful capital city in style when you choose Vienna Marriott Hotel. An upscale experience in the heart of Vienna our premium hotel is located downtown in the historic City Center with exceptional placement on the breathtaking Ringstrasse. Unwind in modern guest rooms and suites many of which boast incredible city views and blend contemporary design with unmatched comfort. Relax on plush pillowtop bedding while staying connected using our high speed WiFi access. Our hotel is pet friendly and welcomes your four legged best friend with special amenities. Workout in our fully equipped Golden Tree Spa or take a dip in the heated indoor pool. After exploring Vienna dine at our onsite restaurants or unwind at our inviting bars. Our newly renovated, state of the art meeting venues offer nearly 9000 square feet of elegant space. With our ideal location guests have easy access to shopping, dining and famous attractions like the Vienna Opera House or St Stephens Cathedral.Marriott

name: K+k Palais Hotel
description: The K+K Palais Hotel is situated in the quiet part of the Vienna's city centre, enjoying close proximity to St Stephen's Cathedral, the Vienna Airport Lines Bus Stop and many major sights, theatres and shopping opportunities. Behind a stylish, historic façade, an elegant hotel of great sophistication and modern luxury awaits you. It is located in a historical building that used to be Emperor Francis Joseph’s city residence. All rooms are fully air-conditioned. As all K+K Hotels, the Palais Hotel is a luxurious boutique hotel offering state-of-the-art amenities and the personal service of a highly motivated staff. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property. The K+K Palais enjoys a convenient location and easy access to the public transport. Metro stops on the U1, U2 and U4 lines are within 300 metres' reach. Rotenturmstraße and Kärntnerstraße are near the hotel.

name: Arthotel ANA Amadeus
description: The elaya hotel vienna city center ehemals Arthotel ANA Amadeus is centrally located in the first district of Vienna, a 6-minute walk from both Saint Stephen's Cathedral and the Hofburg Imperial Palace. Free WiFi is available. The elegant rooms feature a flat-screen TV, a minibar, an electric kettle with a selection of different teas, and a bathroom with a hairdryer and toiletries. The beds feature allergy-free pillows and blankets. In the lobby, a computer is available for all guests of the Amadeus Arthotel ANA. The city's most elegant shops as well as many restaurants can be found in the immediate vicinity. The Vienna State Opera is a 13-minute walk away, and a public parking garage is at Morzinplatz, a 5-minute walk away. The Hofburg Congress and Event Centre is a 10-minute walk away.

name: Eventhotel Pyramide
description: Directly opposite the SCS, Austria’s largest shopping centre, Eventhotel Pyramide features a large spa and recreation area with indoor and outdoor pools and free access for guests. Free WiFi is available in public areas and some rooms. The air-conditioned rooms offer a safe, minibar, satellite TV, and bathroom with a hairdryer. Featuring a 42-metre pyramid, which hosts an event centre for up to 4,000 people, Eventhotel is surrounded by 45,000 m² of greenery. The restaurant includes a garden and a bar with a terrace. An 18-hole golf course in Brunn am Gebirge is only 5-minute drive away and offers discounted green fees to guests of Eventhotel Pyramide. The Badener Bahn railway line stops right in front of Hotel Pyramide and takes you to Vienna’s State Opera, as well as to the centre of Baden, within 25 minutes. Free parking is possible on site. The A2, A21 and A23 motorways can be reached within a 5-minute drive.

name: Novotel Suites Wien City Donau
description: Start your day at Novotel Suites Wien City with a hearty breakfast on the terrace overlooking greenery. Business travellers will appreciate the pleasant working environment in our suites and families will love the freshly renovated junior suites. There is a direct subway connection to the city center and the Wiener Prater is just a short walk away. Wrap up your day in the stylish 24-hour hotel bar.accorhotels.com

name: Hollmann Beletage Design & Boutique Hotel
description: Surrounded by the historic buildings of Vienna's inner city, the Hollmann Beletage Design & Boutique Hotel is a boutique hotel offering air conditioning and sauna. Located within a 2-minute walking distance from St. Stephen’s Cathedral, 3 minutes from the famous shopping streets Kärntner Strasse and Graben and 10 minutes from the State Opera. The Schwedenplatz Underground Station and tram stops are a 4-minute away and the Stephansplatz Underground Station is a 7-minute away. The hotel is also only a 20-minute drive from the airport. Continental breakfast, bed linen and towels can be booked.

name: Austria Trend Hotel Doppio
description: The new 4-star hotel belonging to Austria Trend Hotels & Resorts is a completion of the T-Center, which won the Otto Wagner Prize for Urban Planning in 2004. The hotel fits ideally into the office and business centre and it's a perfect addition for "Neu Marx", the new site for media, research and technology. The hotel is a perfect starting point for the business guest due to its proximity to public transport and to the airport.The 155 modern rooms at Austria Trend Hotel Doppio**** invite you to relax and unwind - be it after a successful business appointment or a sightseeing tour around Vienna. You will be able to benefit from every conceivable modern comfort, as well as state-of-the-art equipment in all our rooms and hotel public areas.Our breakfast room comfortably seats up to 120 people and pampers our guests with a lavish breakfast buffet. If you happen to feel a little hungry, feel free to stop by at our contemporary furnished bar and order something for in-between! We offer tasty cold and warm snacks, as well as a multitude of beverages - all day long, to enjoy right away or for take-away purposes. Try as well our "Coffee to go" or the American ice cream "Ben & Jerry's".For your next event Austria Trend Hotel Doppio**** provides 2 seminar rooms, sized 39 m and 66 m (105 m in total). Both rooms are located on the first floor and feature abundant natural lighting, video projector, flip chart and pin board.Austria Trend Hotel Doppio**** offers a fitness room, which features state-of-the-art cardio equipment. The nearby recreational area Prater is ideal for sports enthusiasts to indulge in their passion and enjoy a refreshing jog or relaxing stroll. Entrance parking: Marianne Heinisch GasseiHotelier/iStay

name: Novotel Wien City
description: Novotel Wien City features modern family-friendly rooms with balconies overlooking Ringstrasse, a lobby with a colorful play area for kids and 24 hours fitness center. Enjoy regional and organic-certified cuisine at the breakfast buffet and our Family and Friends restaurant. Our location near popular Viennese attractions like the Prater, cathedral and St. Stephens Square makes it ideal for exploring the city.accorhotels.com

name: Maxx By Steigenberger Vienna
description: MAXX Hotel Vienna is conveniently and centrally located between Westbahnhof Train Station and the city centre. All rooms and suites feature a modern design and all contemporary amenities. Within a few minutes you can reach the most beautiful squares and sights in the heart of Vienna. A wide range of shops and restaurants is just steps away from the hotel. The Naschmarkt open-air market is 2 underground stops away, and Schönbrunn Palace is 3 stops away.

name: Mercure Wien City
description: Would you like to discover Vienna? Our 4 star hotel is centrally located and quiet. Ideal for exploring the vibrant downtown with Vienna attractions on a walk. Our air-conditioned rooms, the hotels underground parking garage and free WiFi in all areas offer the best possible conditions for a successful stay.accorhotels.com

name: The Guesthouse Vienna
description: The Guesthouse Vienna is situated in the heart of Vienna, just a 5-minute walk from Saint Stephen's Cathedral and next to the Albertina Museum. It offers an individual atmosphere and amenities like free WiFi and a bakery on site. This design hotel features modern, air-conditioned rooms with high-class furniture, a Bang & Olufsen TV and audio system, a living area, and a bathroom with a shower. The rooms on the upper floors have views of the State Opera and the city centre. A concierge service is available. Four bottles of Austrian wine, beer, non-alcoholic drinks, tea and coffee are provided in each room free of charge. The brasserie and bakery on the ground floor of the house serves light, healthy dishes and freshly baked bread and sweets. An à la carte breakfast is available all day and the property offers various breakfast options including cheaper breakfast. The Guesthouse Vienna enjoys a central location, only a 3-minute walk from the State Opera and the Karlsplatz Underground Station, and a 5-minute walk from the Burggarten Park and the Heldenplatz Square. The Hofburg Congress and Event Centre is a 10-minute walk away.

name: 25hours Hotel Vienna at MuseumsQuartier
description: The 25hours Hotel at MuseumsQuartier plays with the dreams and sensations associated with the world of the circus. From the museum district to the Prater, the Opera Ball, the Life Ball and the city's many music venues, Vienna has always been synonymous with sensations and shows. The hotel symbolizes the tradition steeped institution that is the circus. It is surreal, surprising and sexy a place that plays with fantasies and the exotic. The lines between imagination, reality, space and time are blurred.accorhotels.com

name: B&B Hotel Wien-Hbf
description: Ideally located in the 10th district of Vienna, B&B Hotel Wien-Hbf is located 2.3 km from Belvedere Palace, 3.4 km from Karlskirche and 3.5 km from the Viennese State Opera. At the hotel, all rooms include a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. All guest rooms at B&B Hotel Wien-Hbf feature air conditioning and a wardrobe. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Speaking German and English, staff are always on hand to help at the reception. Leopold Museum is 4.2 km from B&B Hotel Wien-Hbf, while Haus des Meeres is 4.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Vienna International Airport, 17 km from the hotel. Guests receive a discount at a public car park, located a 2-minute walk away.

name: Renaissance Wien Hotel
description: Ideally located in a quiet section of Vienna Renaissance Wien Hotel welcomes those traveling in Austria with thoughtful amenities and a prime location near the city center. Our 4 star family friendly hotel reveals the best of Vienna. Our hotel is pet friendly, we welcome trained pets for a EUR 18 per night non-refundable fee. The property is steps from the U-Bahn subway station and near popular attractions, including historic Schonbrunn Palace, the legendary Naschmarkt and iconic St. Stephen's Cathedral. Recharge in stylishly redesigned, pet-friendly accommodations. Every room and suite features modern decor, indulgent bedding, mini-refrigerators, ample workstations and free WiFi. Order from 24-hour room service or indulge at our outstanding restaurant. Work off the day in our hotel's fitness center and visit the sauna and salt room. For those planning events our sophisticated venues are ideal for everything from business training sessions to romantic weddings.Marriott

name: Appartementhotel Marien-Hof
description: No description found

name: Motel One Wien Westbahnhof
description: The Motel One is a modern hotel in Vienna’s Westbahnhof transport hub and shopping complex, a 10-minute underground ride from the city centre. It offers free WiFi and air-conditioned, soundproof rooms. The stylish rooms include a flat-screen satellite TV, a mobile workstation, and a design bathroom with elegant furnishings and a rain shower. Motel One Wien Westbahnhof features a 24-hour front desk and a bar decorated with Arne Jacobsen chairs and Swarovski chandeliers. The Mariahilfer Straße shopping street is just a few steps away, and the underground lines U3 and U6 stop in the complex. An airport bus stop is right outside.

name: K+K Hotel Maria Theresia
description: Located in Vienna, K+K Hotel Maria Theresia is within a 25-minute drive of Vienna International Airport and offers free wireless internet access in all areas and a sauna. It provides 4-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. The hotel has a fitness centre with a sauna. Multilingual staff can assist with reservations or dining recommendations, and an express check-in facility is offered for guest convenience. Rooms feature modern features, including mini bars and flat-screen TVs. Hot drinks can be brewed with the available tea and coffee supplies, and savoured in the comfort of the room's living area. A satisfying breakfast is served every morning at K+K Hotel Maria Theresia, and there are numerous restaurants and cafés close by. K+K Hotel Maria Theresia is ideally located for sightseeing in Vienna with Austrian Parliament Building and the Kunsthistorisches Museum within walking distance. The Vienna State Opera and Karlsplatz Train Station can easily be reached on foot.Revato

name: roomz Vienna Prater
description: Newly opened in June 2018, roomz Vienna Prater enjoys an ideal location close to the Vienna Prater with the Giant Ferris Wheel, the city center and also provides excellent traffic connection. This new city hotel offers guests free WiFi and a fitness centre. The rooms come with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. The rooms are equipped with air conditioning, and some units at roomz Vienna Prater have a balcony. The units feature a wardrobe. A buffet breakfast can be enjoyed every morning at the property and guests can also dine on-site. Languages spoken at the reception include German, English and French, and guests are invited to request advice on the area when needed. Messe Wien is a 14-minute walk from the accommodation. Vienna International Airport is 17 km away.

name: Hotel König
description: The Hotel König is only a 12-minute underground ride away from the centre of Vienna. It offers modern rooms, fine cuisine and free WiFi throughout. All rooms in the König Hotel have a private bathroom and cable TV. Some rooms are air-conditioned. Typical Austrian specialities and international cuisine are served in the restaurant. Situated only 200 metres from the Simmering stop of the U3 underground line, all sights of Vienna are easily reachable from Hotel König.

name: Mercure Hotel Raphael Wien
description: Mercure Raphael Hotel Wien enjoys a quiet and central location in the heart of Vienna. Situated close to Mariahilferstrasse, our hotel is ideal for culture and shopping, and a variety of restaurants is also nearby. Attractions such as the Hofburg Imperial Palace, State Opera House and Schönbrunn Palace are easily accessible. Viennese charm in a cosmopolitan atmosphere: We want to make your stay with us a special experience. Take us at our word - we look forward to welcoming you.accorhotels.com

name: Campanile Vienna South
description: Situated in Vienna and within 3.3 km of Vienna Main Railway Station, Campanile Vienna South has a bar, non-smoking rooms, and free WiFi throughout the property. The property is around 4.5 km from Belvedere Palace, 4.6 km from Wien Westbahnhof Railway Station and 4.8 km from Karlskirche. Wiener Stadthalle is 5.4 km away and Leopold Museum is 5.5 km from the hotel. The rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV. At Campanile Vienna South rooms have bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation. Speaking German and English, staff are always on hand to help at the 24-hour front desk. Museum of Military History is 4.8 km from Campanile Vienna South, while Schönbrunn Palace is 5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Vienna International Airport, 21 km from the hotel.

name: The Rooms Bed & Breakfast
description: The rooms Bed & Breakfast offers individually furnished rooms, air-conditioning, free Wi-Fi access, and is lovated in a quiet location near the Alte Donau recreation area. The individually designed rooms are furnished with many design pieces and feature spacious bathrooms. They can be found in a new building with a big terrace and a garden. The city centre can be reached in only a few minutes from the Kagran underground station, which is only a 2-minute walk away. The Austria Center and the UN headquarters can also be reached on foot from The rooms. Restaurants, a big shopping centre, and many leisure options are close by. The house is heated exclusively by an air heat pump and supplied with electricity by a photovoltaic system on the roof.

name: pentahotel Vienna
description: Situated in Vienna, the hotel is within a 35-minute drive of Vienna International Airport and offers a Finnish sauna and a bowling alley. It also provides a 24-hour reception, meeting rooms and free Wi-Fi. This 4-star hotel offers porters, a library and luggage storage. For fashionable travellers a bar provides a happy setting for an after-meal drink. Pentahotel Vienna has air conditioned rooms with blackout curtains, a pillow menu and a rain shower. Each have a flat-screen TV, converters/voltage adaptors and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. Those staying at pentahotel Vienna are welcome to relax with a beverage at the in-house bar, or enjoy supper at pentalounge. Pentahotel Vienna is close to shops, dining and Vienna's nightlife. The hotel's multilingual staff are available to ensure that every traveller has a comfortable stay.Revato

name: Hotel Zeitgeist Vienna Hauptbahnhof
description: Only 300 metres from Vienna Main Train Station and the Südtiroler Platz Underground Station (line U1), Hotel Zeitgeist Vienna Hauptbahnhof offers rooms with free high-speed WiFi and a restaurant. The fitness room with modern TechnoGym equipment and the sauna with infrared cabin are available to guests free of charge. The air-conditioned rooms come with large windows, comfortable beds, a large flat-screen cable TV and a bathroom with a shower or a bathtub. Some rooms have an own terrace. À la carte dishes are served in the Lokal-Café-Bar Pergola. There are also vending machines provided on floors 3 to 6. In the chill and workout area in the Zeitgeist Hotel's courtyard, guests can play badminton and boccia, and use a power rack and a putting green. A fitness room is also available. A private parking garage, which can be used against a surcharge, is located on site. The hotel’s front desk is staffed 24 hours a day. The Keplerplatz Underground Station (line U1) is 600 metres away and provides connection to Vienna’s city centre and the Wiener Prater Amusement Park.

name: Hotel Nestroy Wien
description: Offering free WiFi Hotel Nestroy Wien is just a 2-minute walk from the Taborstraße Underground Station, which offers direct connections to Vienna's city centre, the Prater Amusement Park, and the Fairgrounds. Furthermore, guests of the Hotel Nestroy have free access to the sauna and fitness room at the Hotel Imlauer. All rooms are air-conditioned and feature a flat-screen satellite TV with free Sky channels and a bathroom.The rooms are accessible by a lift that stops in the mezzanine. The Nestroy features a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service, which is located at Hotel IMLAUER Wien. The arrival registration takes place also at it.

name: numa | Strauss Apartments
description: Set within 2 km of Schönbrunn Palace and 2.3 km of Wiener Stadthalle in Vienna, numa I Strauss Apartments offers accommodation with free WiFi and seating area. All units here are air-conditioned and feature a flat-screen TV, a living room with a sofa, a well-equipped kitchen with a dining area, and a private bathroom with shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries. A dishwasher, a microwave and fridge are also offered, as well as a kettle and a coffee machine. Schönbrunner Gardens is 3.5 km from numa I Strauss Apartments, while Parliament of Austria is 3.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Vienna International Airport, 18 km from the accommodation.

name: B&B Hotel Wien-Stadthalle
description: Attractively set in the 15. Rudolfsheim-Fünfhaus district of Vienna, B&B Hotel Wien-Stadthalle is situated 600 metres from Wiener Stadthalle, less than 1 km from Wien Westbahnhof Railway Station and 2.7 km from Parliament of Austria. The property is around 2.7 km from Leopold Museum, 2.8 km from Vienna City Hall and 2.8 km from Natural History Museum. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. At the hotel, rooms are fitted with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. The rooms at B&B Hotel Wien-Stadthalle have air conditioning and a wardrobe. Buffet and continental breakfast options are available each morning at the accommodation. Kunsthistorisches Museum is 3.1 km from B&B Hotel Wien-Stadthalle, while Vienna Volksgarten is 3.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Vienna International Airport, 21 km from the hotel.

name: The Levante Rathaus Apartments
description: Just steps away from the Burg Theatre, the Rathaus (town hall) and the Rathaus underground station, The Levante Rathaus Apartments is housed in a building from the Biedermeier period with a picturesque inner courtyard. Free Wi-Fi is available. The apartments include a bedroom, a separate living room with a sofa bed, and a kitchen or kitchenette with all necessary cutlery and crockery. Bed linen and towels are provided. A shared laundry room with a washing machine and a dryer is at guests' disposal free of charge. Sights such as St. Stephen’s Cathedral, the Museum of Natural History, the Art History Museum, the Albertina Museum and the Hofburg Imperial Palace can be easily reached on foot.

name: ibis Wien City
description: Whether you are traveling for business or pleasure, you are always welcome at the ibis Wien City Hotel, Schönbrunnerstraße 92. All 94 rooms at the city hotel feature modern comforts, including free WIFI and air-conditioning. The ibis Wien City Hotel is located between two subway stations on the U4 line, which are both 5 minutes' walk from the hotel, so you can get to central locations such as Schönbrunn Palace or the Vienna State Opera at Karlsplatz quickly and easily.accorhotels.com

name: Hotel Orangerie
description: The quietly located Hotel Orangerie is just 100 metres from the Längenfeldgasse and Meidling Hauptstraße Underground Stations. Free high-speed WiFi in all areas. Schönbrunn Palace can be reached by underground in 5 minutes. The modern, air-conditioned rooms feature wooden floors, a flat-screen satellite TV, a safe, and a bathroom with a hairdryer, toiletries, and a walk-in shower. Hotel Orangerie also features a 24-hour reception, a bar and a breakfast buffet. The State Opera in the city centre can be reached on the U4 underground line within 10 minutes. Meidling Train Station is 1 stop away on the U6 line from Niederhofstraße Underground Station, 300 metres from the hotel.

name: Meininger Hotel Wien Downtown Sissi
description: The Meininger Downtown Sissi is situated in the Leopoldstadt District, a 10-minute stroll from the Schottenring Underground Station. The modern en-suite rooms are all soundproofed. Wi-Fi is provided free of charge. Each of the rooms at the Meininger Downtown Sissi features modern interior design. The modern bathrooms are spacious and bright. Hotel Downtown Sissi features a common kitchen which is at guests’ disposal. The sleek and modern bar is a great place to play a game of billiards or meet fellow travellers. Guests can rent bikes directly at the 24-hours reception. Popular nearby attractions include the Prater Amusement Park with its Giant Ferris Wheel lies 1.5 km to the east of the hotel.

name: So/ Vienna
description: SO/ Vienna is so lively, expressive and energetic so that even experienced travelers are constantly fascinated. The playful and consciously deliberately rebellious interpretation of luxury makes it a dazzling addition to the local hotel scene. Award-winning cuisine and an impressive view over Vienna are part of the "Just Say SO" Service.accorhotels.com

name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater/Messe
description: Immerse yourself in 4-star amenities at Courtyard Vienna Prater/Messe in Austria. Our beautifully-designed hotel offers travelers a fantastic resting spot in the heart of Vienna's vibrant cityscape with easy access to the Vienna Fairgrounds, the new business quarter, the U2 Krieau Subway Station and the Messe Wien Exhibition & Congress Center. Enjoy taking walks through the nearby Prater's green spaces before rejuvenating your energy in our spacious gym or wellness center. In the evening, enjoy specialty cocktails in our lobby lounge before dining in our hotel's delicious signature restaurant. Retreat to spacious, modern rooms and suites for a peaceful night's sleep with comfortable bedding and soundproof windows. If visiting Vienna for event planning reasons, take advantage of our 14 flexible venue spaces with state-of-the-art technology, ample parking space, professional planners and catering services. Whatever your reason for visiting, we look forward to welcoming you at Courtyard Vienna Prater/Messe.Marriott

name: Austria Trend Hotel Bosei
description: Located in Viennas green suburbs, yet still close to the city centre, the newly renovated Austria Trend Hotel Bosei serves as an ideal base for visitors from around the world, be they here on business or to experience the rich culture of this fascinating city. The view from the hotel over the surrounding golf course and the business skyline of Vienna is a constant source of memorable impressions for each and every guest. The location in Viennas Tenth District directly at the Wienerberg recreation area has nothing but benefits for our guests. On the one hand, our hotel is close to entertainment and business places as the Twin Towers and the Europlaza, while on the other, you are still able to stay in a quiet, verdant setting. Guests never cease to be impressed by the location of the hotel with its marvellous views. With 195 rooms, inluding 56 newly equipped Business Plus Rooms and 8 Junior Suites, the Austria Trend Hotel Bosei is the perfect place to enjoy a memorable stay at the city of Vienna.iHotelier/iStay

name: Club Hotel Cortina
description: Located in the peaceful residential district of Hietzing, Hotel Cortina is only a 5-minute walk from the Ober Sankt Veit Underground Station. Free WiFi is provided in all rooms and in the public areas of the hotel. The Cortina Hotel’s quiet and modern rooms offer cable TV, a minibar, a safe, and a bathroom with hairdryer. In the morning, guests can enjoy a breakfast buffet. A wide range of drinks and snacks is available at the Cortina’s bar. Schönbrunn Palace can be reached by underground (line U4) in 6 minutes, and Vienna’s city centre in 15 minutes.

name: Pension Neuer Markt
description: Situated right in the heart of Vienna, Pension Neuer Markt is decorated in an Old Viennese style, next to the Kärntnerstraße Shopping Street. St. Stephen's Cathedral and the Stepahnsplatz Underground Station are only a 3-minute walk away. The vintage-style rooms in the Pension Neuer Markt have a private bathroom including a hairdryer. Free WiFi is at guests' disposal. Breakfast is served as of 06:30 in the elegant breakfast room, decorated with historic chandeliers. Famous cafés like Hawelka and Demel, the Spanish Riding School and the Hofburg Palace can all be reached on foot within 5 to 10 minutes. Public parking is available at the Kärnterring Parking Garage, just a 5-minute walk from Pension Neuer Markt. The Karlsplatz Underground Station is a 10-minute walk away.

name: Arcotel Wimberger Vienna
description: ARCOTEL Wimberger Wien provides direct access to Vienna's main sights, thanks to its location facing tram services and the Burggasse-Stadthalle Metro Stop. On-site facilities include a wellness and fitness area offering a hot tub, sauna, and views over the city. WiFi is available free of charge. The air-conditioned rooms are spacious and fitted with modern furnishings. A flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a work desk and en-suite bathroom with a bath and selected shower products are also featured. The Handwerk restaurant serves classical and trendy Austrian dishes, inspired by international influences. All meals are freshly cooked, using only the best-quality and regional products. A wide range of drinks and a small selection of snacks are available at Joe's Bar, which is decorated in a colonial style. During summer, guests can enjoy drinks and light snacks in the courtyard. ARCOTEL Wimberger Wien is only a 5-minute walk from the Mariahilfer Straße shopping street and the newly renovated Western Train Station, which features many shopping possibilities. The Stadthalle Indoor Concert Arena is 100 metres away from the property.

name: Leonardo Hotel Vienna Schönbrunn
description: Leonardo Hotel Vienna Schönbrunn is conveniently located in Vienna’s 15th district, a 5-minute underground ride from the Schönbrunn Palace and the Westbahnhof Railway Station. The Längenfeld Underground Station (lines U4, U6) is just 100 metres away. Air-conditioned rooms with an LED cable TV, free Wi-Fi and a seating area are featured in the hotel. The bathrooms are fitted with a shower and the rooms come with modern furniture. Rooms for disabled guests are available. A breakfast buffet is available on request and Star Inn Schönbrunn. The private parking garage can be used against a surcharge. Vienna’s city centre is just 4 underground stops away and the Mariahilferstraße Shopping Street can be reached within 5 minutes by public transport.

name: Austria Classic Hotel Wien
description: Austria Classic Hotel Wien is only 200 metres away from an underground station with direct connections to the city centre. The hotel is entirely air-conditioned and offers free WiFi access. Located close to the Prater amusement park, Hotel Wien has been owned by the same family for 200 years. The modern and spacious rooms all have flat-screen TVs. Most face the quiet courtyard. The sauna, the fitness centre, and an internet terminal are available free of charge. The rich breakfast buffet is available from 06:30 to 10:30. Austria Classic Hotel Wien also has a roof terrace. The city centre, the Austria Center (conference centre), and the UN headquarters can be reached in just a few minutes from the nearby Praterstern underground station (lines U1 and U2). There are also direct trains to the airport. The Prater with the Riesenrad (ferris wheel) and the Wiener Messe (exhibition centre) are only a few steps away from Austria Classic Hotel Wien.

name: Luxury near Castle
description: Conveniently set in the 04. Wieden district of Vienna, Luxury near Castle is located 700 metres from Vienna Main Railway Station, 400 metres from Belvedere Palace and 1.2 km from Museum of Military History. The property is set 1.2 km from Karlskirche, 2.7 km from Albertina Museum and 3.1 km from Kunsthistorisches Museum. Free WiFi and private check-in and check-out are provided. All units are equipped with a TV with satellite channels, fridge, a coffee machine, a shower, bathrobes and a desk. Each room includes a private bathroom with a hair dryer, while selected rooms are fitted with a terrace and others also offer garden views. At the guest house every room is equipped with bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near Luxury near Castle include Vienna State Opera, Musikverein and House of Music. The nearest airport is Vienna International Airport, 17 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Terminus
description: Situated in a quiet side street near the Mariahilfer Straße shopping street, Hotel Terminus offers free Wi-Fi and rooms with satellite TV and a private bathroom. A breakfast buffet is served each morning. A public parking garage is nearby. The picturesque district of Spittelberg and the Naschmarkt (open-air market) are only a few steps away from Hotel Terminus. The city centre can be reached in a short walk, and many underground, bus and tram lines are close by.

name: Hotel Schani Wien
description: The stylish Hotel Schani Wien is located only 300 meters from the main train station in Vienna’s Belvedere Quarter and combines modern and traditional elements of the Viennese culture. The tram (line D) stops in front of the property and provides connection to the Ringstraße and sights such as Vienna State Opera or Vienna City Hall. Each of the individually furnished rooms comes with high-quality mattresses and is equipped with a flat-screen TV and a desk. Free WiFi access is available in the rooms and throughout the building. Innovative technologies like a mobile check-in and check-out or the usage of your smart phone as room key are further features of Hotel Schani Wien. Conference rooms and business facilities can be booked as well. After a day of sightseeing, you can relax on the pleasant terrace with greenery or have a drink or a coffee at the on-site bar and café. The Keplerplatz Metro Stop (line U1) is 600 metres away and offers direct connection to the city centre and to the Wiener Prater Amusement Park.

name: das Reinisch business hotel
description: Set in Schwechat, 13 km from Ernst Happel Stadium, Das Reinisch Hotel & Restaurant offers accommodation with free bikes, free private parking, a fitness centre and a shared lounge. Offering a bar, the property is located within 14 km of Kunst Haus Wien - Museum Hundertwasser. The hotel has a sauna, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. At the hotel all rooms include air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Das Reinisch Hotel & Restaurant all rooms come with bed linen and towels. A continental, vegetarian or vegan breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Austrian cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Das Reinisch Hotel & Restaurant offers a sun terrace. You can play billiards at this 4-star hotel, and the area is popular for hiking and cycling. A business centre and vending machines with snacks and drinks are available on site at the hotel. Belvedere Palace is 15 km from Das Reinisch Hotel & Restaurant, while Vienna Prater is 15 km from the property. The nearest airport is Vienna International, 4 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Dormero Hoho Wien
description: Situated in Vienna, 10 km from Austria Center Vienna, DORMERO HoHo Wien features air-conditioned accommodation and a bar. The property is around 13 km from Ernst Happel Stadium, 13 km from Vienna Prater and 14 km from Messe Wien. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. The rooms at the hotel are fitted with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and a bath or shower. At DORMERO HoHo Wien rooms have bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet or a continental breakfast. Kunst Haus Wien - Museum Hundertwasser is 15 km from DORMERO HoHo Wien, while St. Stephen's Cathedral is 15 km from the property. The nearest airport is Vienna International Airport, 25 km from the hotel.

name: Meininger Hotel Wien Downtown Franz
description: Featuring a bar and a games room, this contemporary hotel has a guest kitchen and offers free Wi-Fi in the entire building. It is situated between Augarten Park and the Danube Canal in the upcoming Leopoldstadt district. The stylish rooms feature parquet flooring, a flat-screen TV and many are decorated with panorama photos of Vienna. Each has a private bathroom with a shower. In the mornings, a continental breakfast is served at an extra cost. Light snacks and drinks can be bought from vending machines. Bike rental can be arranged by Meininger Downtown's 24-hours staff. They also provide luggage storage. The Museumsquartier and Vienna State Opera are about 3 km from Meininger Hotel Downtown Franz. Schottenring station is 700 metres from the hotel and offers subway, bus, and tram services.

name: Hotel Donauwalzer
description: The family-run Boutique Hotel Donauwalzer is right next to the Alser Straße Underground Station (line U6) and is within a 15-minute walk of the Ringstraße boulevard, the Votive Church and the Town Hall. It features free WiFi, a spa area (accessible at an extra charge), and a green courtyard. The centre of Vienna is reachable by tram in 6 minutes. All rooms at the Boutique Hotel Donauwalzer have carpeted or parquet floors, a private bathroom, and satellite TV. Coffee and tea machine is available in every room free of charge (including coffee and tea tabs). A hot and cold buffet breakfast with sparkling wine is offered every morning. Every weekend (Saturday and Sunday) live classical music is played at breakfast. Vienna’s General Hospital (AKH) is only 1 underground stop away. The Hernalser Gürtel Tram Stop is right in front of the Donauwalzer.

name: B&B Hotel Wien-Meidling
description: Located in Vienna, 3.4 km from Schönbrunn Palace, B&B Hotel Wien-Meidling provides air-conditioned rooms and a bar. The property is situated 3.5 km from Schönbrunner Gardens, 4.9 km from Wien Westbahnhof Railway Station and 5.1 km from Wiener Stadthalle. Private parking is available on site. With a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at the hotel also provide guests with free WiFi. At B&B Hotel Wien-Meidling every room comes with a desk and a flat-screen TV. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet or a continental breakfast. Rosarium is 5.3 km from B&B Hotel Wien-Meidling, while Vienna Main Railway Station is 6.2 km away. The nearest airport is Vienna International Airport, 22 km from the hotel.

name: Kyriad Vienna Altmannsdorf
description: This non-smoking 3-star hotel in the district of Meidling is located just 3-minute walk from Am Schöpfwerk Underground Station, and Vienna’s city centre can be reached in 15 minutes. The modern rooms and apartments at Hotel Kyriad Vienna Altmannsdorf feature cable TV, a safe, and a bathroom with hairdryer. The apartments also feature a kitchenette and a balcony or terrace. The Cafeteria serves daily a continental breakfast.

name: Hotel City Central
description: A 10-minute walk from Saint Stephen's Cathedral, the smart Hotel City Central is located right on the edge of Vienna's first district. It offers a buffet breakfast and free WiFi. Each room has individually controllable air-conditioning and a flat-screen Sky satellite TV. Family rooms and apartments are also available. The buffet breakfast is served in the air-conditioned conservatory. Numerous restaurants can also be found right across the bridge over the Danube Canal, in the very centre of Vienna. The Schwedenplatz stop of the U1 and U4 underground lines, as well as the departure point of the boat rides to Bratislava, is just a 3-minute walk away from the City Central Hotel.

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Vienna City East
description: Set a pace that suits you at Residence Inn by Marriott Vienna City East. Whether you're with us for a few days, a few weeks, or a few months, your daily routine matters. You'll thrive at Residence Inn with the conveniences you need. Like spacious studio with living and sleeping areas. A fully equipped kitchen ready for your favorite cuisine. Complimentary grocery delivery service to fill your refrigerator and satisfy cravings. Free Internet for connecting to work and the outside world. Free hot breakfast to start mornings off right. And, a fitness center for strengthening your body and soul. Relax and unwind when you want. And stay focused and productive when it's essential. At Residence Inn Vienna City East, we'll make sure you thrive during your stay.Marriott

name: Hotel Boltzmann
description: Located in Vienna’s elegant Alsergrund district, Hotel Boltzmann is set in a quiet side street just a 10-minute walk from the Schottentor Underground Station and the University of Vienna. Free WiFi is available. The modern rooms offer individually adjustable air conditioning, wooden furniture, satellite TV, a safe, tea making facilites and a bathroom with hairdryer. Hotel Boltzmann features a bar and a 24-hour front desk. A large breakfast buffet is served every morning. The Spitalgasse/Währinger Straße Tram Stop (tram numbers 37, 38, 40, 41, 42, 5, 33) is just a 1-minute walk away. Within a 10-minute walk or a short tram ride you can reach the famous Ringstraße boulevard and the Sigmund Freud Museum. The private garage parking is available on site at an additional cost. Public parking is possible in front of the hotel. This requires a local parking permit on weekdays, but is free on weekends and public holidays.

name: O11 Boutique Hotel Vienna
description: O11 is more than just a hotel - O11 is a lifestyle. Our guests experience exclusive luxury, state-of-the-art design and the beat of Vienna's city center. It is a unique concept that will surprise, delight and captivate you. The spectacular and detailed ambience and the unique location directly opposite the Vienna State Opera make O11 THE meeting place in Vienna.iHotelier/iStay

name: Hotel Urania
description: Family-run for over 50 years, Hotel Urania is just 100 metres from the Danube Canal and a 10-minute walk from the Hundertwasser House and the Wien-Mitte Train and Underground Station. Free WiFi is available. The modern and spacious rooms are individually furnished and feature satellite TV and a bathroom. Each room has a unique theme with a special style, such as Roman, Japanese, Hundertwasser, Africa, or Art Nouveau. Guests of the Urania Hotel benefit from a bar and a 24-hour reception. The Giant Ferris Wheel and the Prater Amusement Park can be reached on foot in 12 minutes, and St. Stephen’s Cathedral is a 20-minute walk away.

name: Austria Trend Hotel Anatol
description: Austria Trend Hotel Anatol is a modern city hotel which captivates all its guests in matters both of design and functionality, radiating an understated elegance and featuring all the modern comforts. Located close to the Mariahilfer Strasse, the hotel serves as an ideal base for any personal or business stay in Vienna.Our outstanding access to the public transportation network guarantees you quick travel times throughout the city.iHotelier/iStay

name: Hotel Secession an der Oper
description: The Hotel Secession an der Oper is situated in the historical center of Vienna, in the Mariahilf district. Vienna's main tourist attractions (such as the Vienna State Opera House, St. Stephan's Cathedral and various museums) are just a short walk away. The hotel offers spacious, air-conditioned rooms and an indoor car park to make your stay as comfortable as possible. The family-run hotel has a fantastic view of the golden cupola of the Vienna Secession. Traditional Viennese hospitality, cozy atmosphere, spacious, optimally appointed rooms and an attentive team who care about your wellbeing look forward to your visit! The Karlsplatz Underground Station (lines U1, U2 and U4) can be reached in a 5-minute walk. The State Opera, the Ringstraße boulevard and the Museum Quarter are also only a 5-minute walk away. St. Stephen’s Cathedral is reachable within a 15-minute walk from the Hotel Secession an der Oper.

name: Der Stasta
description: The family-run Der Stasta Hotel is located in a southern district of Vienna, a half-hour ride on public transport from the centre of the city. It features a restaurant with a summer terrace where you can enjoy typical Viennese cuisine. Free public parking is available. Free Wi-Fi is available in the entire Der Stasta Hotel. All rooms come with solid wooden furniture, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Most rooms are facing the garden. Right opposite the building you can find a new shopping centre. Der Stasta is also easily reachable by car via the Brunn am Gebirge exit of the A22 motorway.

name: Pension Dr. Geissler
description: Pension Dr. Geissler enjoys a central location in a side street of Vienna’s city centre. Situated in a typical Viennese building, it offers traditionally furnished rooms with a private bathroom and cable TV. Guests can benefit from the proximity to the famous St. Stephens’s Cathedral which can be reached within a 10-minute walk. Schwedenplatz Metro Station is only a minutes' walk. Trams 1 and 2, airport shuttles and boats to Bratislava also leave from there. The Danube Canal with its cafes and bars is a 5-minute walk away. A public pool on a boat and artificial beach bars can also be found there. Boat trips to Bratislava are also available on the canal.

name: Wiener Gäste Zimmer
description: Wiener Gäste Zimmer is located in Vienna’s 10th district, in the building of a traditional Viennese vinegar and beer brewery and oil press. By underground, guests can reach the State Opera within 10 minutes, and St. Stephen’s Cathedral within 15 minutes. The rooms are fitted in an industrial style and feature wooden floors and an air conditioning system. Free WiFi is available, and every room comes with a private bathroom featuring a shower, a hairdryer. free toiletries, and a toilet. Breakfast includes various homemade products. Wiener Gäste Zimmer also offers a shared-use kitchen and on request, a kitchen chef can prepare meals for the guests. The Reumannplatz Underground Stop is 600 metres away, and the Vienna Main Train Station is a 5-minute underground ride away.

name: Das Tigra Hotel
description: This family-run hotel offers a very central location in a quiet street in the heart of Vienna, just a 10-minute walk away from Saint Stephen’s Cathedral. The spacious and modern rooms and suites of Hotel Das Tigra are air-conditioned and feature satellite TV, a minibar, safe, and a bathroom. In the morning you can enjoy a rich breakfast buffet with many typically Viennese dishes. Famous Viennese sights such as the State Opera, the Hofburg Imperial Palace, the Burg Theatre and the Graben, Kohlmarkt and Kärntner Strasse shopping streets can be easily reached in short walks. The Herrengasse Underground Station (line U3) is only a 3-minute walk from the hotel. In 1773, Mozart and his father lived in a small apartment in the historical part of the hotel building, which dates from the 16th century, when they were invited to perform in front of the Empress Maria Theresia at Schönbrunn Palace. At the façade to the left of the hotel entrance, you can see a memorial plaque commemorating Mozart’s first stay in Vienna.

name: Hotel Deutschmeister
description: Set in Vienna, 1.8 km from Vienna Volksgarten, Hotel Deutschmeister offers accommodation with a garden, private parking, a terrace and a bar. This 3-star hotel offers free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.5 km from Vienna City Hall. The units at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a bath or shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Hotel Deutschmeister all rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a buffet or continental breakfast. Popular points of interest near Hotel Deutschmeister include Hofburg, St. Stephen's Cathedral and Imperial Treasury Vienna. The nearest airport is Vienna International Airport, 19 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Enziana Wien
description: Only a 5-minute walk from Belvedere Palace, Hotel Enziana Wien is also only a 5-minute tram ride away from Vienna’s famous Ringstraße Boulevard. The tram stop is just 100 metres away. Free WiFi is available. All rooms are equipped with cable TV and have a private bathroom with toiletries. Breakfast is available every morning. The Rennweg Train Station, which offers direct connections to the airport, is only 250 metres away from the Hotel Enziana Wien.

name: Hotel Gilbert
description: Located in the heart of Vienna, in the trendy 7th district right next to the Ringstrasse, the Boutique Hotel Gilbert & flora is the ideal starting point for a stay in Vienna. All the sights of the city center can be easily reached on foot. The reception is staffed 24 hours a day, transfers and excursions can be organised. The modern rooms with many nice details are air-conditioned and equipped with a desk, kettle, safe and flat-screen TV as well as high-quality cosmetic products. In the house is the multi-award-winning &flora restaurant, where breakfast is also served. The Art History and Natural History Museums, the Leopold Museum, the City Hall, the Parliament and the Hofburg are located in the immediate vicinity of the hotel. The nearest airport is Vienna International Airport, 18km from Hotel Gilbert.

name: NH Vienna Airport Conference Center
description: The NH Vienna Airport Conference Center hotel, previously known as NH Wien Airport, is favorably located across from the arrivals hall of Vienna International Airport. As such, there are numerable transportation options close by, including a train station and bus and CAT stations. The Flugenhafen Wien is within walking distance and the hotel is approximately 16 minutes from the Historic Center of Vienna. Nearby shopping at Shopping City Süd and Naschmarkt are easily accessible via local transport. Our 499 soundproofed guest rooms have free Wi-Fi, satellite TV, and a minibar. Our larger upgraded rooms have additional features including connecting rooms, bathrobes, and Nespresso machines. Each morning guests are treated to a breakfast buffet and made-to-order hot dishes are available upon request. The in-hotel Restaurant Mundo offers national and international cuisine for lunch or dinner, including the traditional Wiener Schnitzel. An additional buffet restaurant offers more extensive self-serve dishes. On the ground floor, guests can grab a quick cocktail or unwind a while at The Bar which offers light meals along with a large variety of beverages. Our 21 meeting rooms vary in size, and can hold up to 500 people.NH Hoteles

name: Time Out City Hotel Vienna
description: Located in Vienna’s vibrant sixth district, Time Out City Hotel is 100 metres from the Mariahilfer Straße shopping street and 300 metres from the Museum Quarter. It offers simply furnished rooms in an Art Nouveau building. Free WiFi is available. All rooms have a telephone, large windows and a flat-screen satellite TV. Some rooms come with a private bathroom and others share a shower. Time Out City Hotel Vienna has a lift and a snack bar. Breakfast is served every day in the lounge bar area. Public parking is available nearby, and parking packages can be purchased at the reception. The underground stations Museumsquartier (line U2) and Neubaugasse (line U3) are both just a 5-minute walk away. The Westbahnhof Train Station can be reached within 5 minutes by underground. The Ringstraße boulevard is a 7-minute walk away, St. Stephen’s Cathedral in the city centre is 2 underground stops or a 20-minute walk away.

name: Flemings Selection Hotel Wien City
description: The Flemings Selection Hotel Wien-City is situated in the Josefstadt district, right in the centre of the Danube metropolis. Viennas famous landmarks, St. Stephans Cathedral, the Hofburg and the State Opera, are close to the hotel, which gives satisfaction with its exceptional service, exclusive comfort and a unique design concept. The finest cuisine in a stress-free atmosphere that is the philosophy of the hotels restaurant. Only fresh ingredients from selected suppliers are used. The wine list is also absolutely first class, with its inspiring selection of national and international quality wines. For business guests, the 6 modern meeting rooms and board rooms offer an individual setting for meetings, banquets and conferences.In order to guarantee you a safe stay in our hotels, we implemented a significantly strengthened security concept. This includes, among other things, exclusively cashless payment and the closing of the minibar in the room. Drinks can be purchased at the reception instead.iHotelier/iStay

name: Best Western Plus Amedia Wien
description: The Best Western Plus Amedia Wien is located in the vibrant business district Landstrasse - only four metro stops away from the center of Vienna - we offer cutting-edge design coupled with state of the art technology. Best Western Plus Amedia Wien meets the trend of the times exactly, in all aspects. With the concept FREE MEDIA, we offer access to the most important media of our time. FREE MEDIA means complimentary telephone calls to 24 countries in Europe and high-speed Internet - wireless The hotel offers modern meeting rooms with the best and modern equipment, which the business guests need. We would be very delighted to welcoming you in our Best Western Plus Amedia Wien. Enjoy your stay.bestwestern.com

name: Hotel Kolpinghaus Wien Zentral
description: Kolping Wien Zentral enjoys a central location in the heart of Vienna, 500 metres from the modern Museumsquartier. Wheelchair-accessible rooms, a 24-hour front desk and a spacious terrace are provided. The exterior facade has been designed by the artist Karl Korab. All rooms at this 2-star hotel are functionally furnished and have a private bathroom. Free access to WiFi is available in public areas on the first floor and in some rooms. Guests can enjoy breakfast, on reuqest gluten-free and lactose-free, in the bright breakfast room or on the terrace in nice weather. A supermarket is found in the building. Kolping hotel is 230 metres away from the famous Naschmarkt (open-air market). Restaurants and unique shops can also be found there. Kettenbrückengasse Underground Station is 300 metres away. Guests can reach the centre of Vienna’s Old Town within a 10-minute drive by public transport. The Opera or St. Stephen’s Cathedral are a 15 to 30-minute walk away.

name: Vienna Residence, City Hall - Parliament
description: Living near Vienna’s city center is a privilege many dream of. New to our portfolio, this apartment building is situated in Vienna's sophisticated 8th district – a lovely and wealthy area. It is the perfect place to live: close to impressive city sights but still surrounded by pretty alleys and small charming shops. You can reach the famous Vienna City Hall by foot in only a few minutes. That’s especially convenient as beloved events take place in the Vienna City Hall park! One of our summer favorites is the Vienna Film Festival and in winter, we love the Christmas market and Vienna Ice Dream (an ice skating area). There are many other green areas in your immediate vicinity too, like the Volksgarten or the Burggarten – a special advantage of staying in Vienna’s city center.  The public transport connections are excellent as well. You can reach the U2 subway station Rathaus in just one minute and the U3 subwaystation Volkstheater in eight minutes. And the tram line stops directly in front of your door.  All 13 premium apartments have the beautiful high ceilings typical of Vienna’s old buildings, a smart online key system, fully air-conditioned rooms, and practical work areas. Whether you’re looking for a cozy business apartment, something more spacious with a private balcony, or an extravagant accommodation – you will find your ideal temporary home here. The penthouses, for instance, have a large roof terrace and huge windows. From there, you have an impressive view over Vienna and you can overlook the Vienna City Hall or the Votivkirche. We are looking forward to welcoming you in the lovely 8th district of Vienna!VRBO

name: Vienna Sporthotel
description: Vienna Sporthotel is set in a quiet neighbourhood in Vienna's 3rd district, with easy access to the A4 and A23 motorways and only a 5-minute underground train ride from the city centre, offering an outdoor pool, tennis courts and a spa area. Free WiFi is available and an underground car park with charging station for e-cars is featured. All spacious and air-conditioned rooms come with a minibar, a work desk and flat-screen satellite TV with free pay TV channels. Vienna Sporthotel features a solar-heated outdoor pool (open from May to September), 10 tennis courts (also open from May to September) and a fitness centre and guests can use all free of charge. The spa area is a good place to unwind after a busy day. The Sporthotel also has a restaurant serving international and Italian cuisine, as well as a bar in the lobby. In nice weather, guests can dine outside on the restaurant's terrace. The Schlachthausgasse Underground Station (line U3) can be reached in a 5-minute walk, providing direct connections to the centre. It is a 5-minute walk to the Media Quarter Marx, and just a 2-minute walk to the TownTown Business Park. From April to October, guests can rent motor scooters (Vespa) at the hotel. Guests who requested garage parking can use the e-car charging station free of charge.

name: Jufa Hotel Wien
description: JUFA Hotel Wien is a 4-star property situated 250 metres from the Enkplatz Underground Station in Simmering (Grillgasse exit) and offers modern rooms and an atrium lounge. It also offers buggy rental services and free WiFi in all areas. The on-site restaurant offers a rich breakfast buffet, homemade dishes, and, in good weather conditions, barbecue specialities which can be enjoyed on the terrace as well. Every room at JUFA Wien is anti-allergenic and has air conditioning, a bathroom, a seating area and a TV. Suites come with a balcony or terrace. A games area and a playground will entertain younger guests, and there is also a youth area with tabletop football facilities. Special facilities include rooms for disabled guests and mother and child friendly parking spaces (surcharge). St. Stephen's Cathedral can be reached by public transport in less than 15 minutes. Parks, cafés and restaurants are within a 10-minute walk. Vienna International Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

name: Austria Trend Hotel Beim Theresianum
description: The friendly Austria Trend Hotel Beim Theresianum is located near one of the best known historical sights in Vienna, the Belvedere Palace, and is only a short walk away from the city centre. The 115 Classic and Executive rooms are cosily furnished. The hotels offers also a garage. A quiet garden and terrace expand our offer and are perfect for enjoying your breakfast in the fresh air on a warm morning. The excellent public transport access near the hotel makes all places in Vienna easily reachable within minutes. Your stay at this charming hotel will make your visit to Vienna to a memorable experience.iHotelier/iStay

name: Best Western Plus Hotel Arcadia
description: The Best Western Plus® Hotel Arcadia opened in 2013. For this purpose, a beautiful old typical Viennese building from the 1900's was completely rebuilt, while preserving the art nouveau flavor. This results in a striking mix of the 19th and the 21st century. The Best Western Plus Hotel Arcadia offers you 72 rooms, all equipped with mini-bar, air conditioning, room safe, satellite-television, Wi-Fi as well as high-speed cable Internet, and much more. The interior is elegant and comfortable. Many of the changes which were accomplished during the building process have an ecological background. For example, the heating and cooling system is state-of-the-art, reducing our carbon footprint to a sustainable level. For those interested in seminars and conferences, we offer a fully-equipped conference room for up to 30 participants (projector, audio-system, wireless microphone). Feel free to enjoy a nice drink in our lounge or to relax in the courtyard. Located in the heart of the second district of Vienna, it is only a five minute walk to the Prater, a premium spot for jogging, cycling, or to take a walk in the woods. But mostly the Prater is famous for being a huge amusement park, suited for children and adults alike. Vienna´s largest exhibition center, the Reed Wien Messe, is a ten minute walk from the hotel. Also the historic center is easily reachable, either by underground train, car or other means of transportation. It is only a five minute walk to the Praterstern Station, a major transportation hub (with bus, underground train, tram, and train stops).bestwestern.com

name: Suite Hotel 200m zum Prater
description: Set in a 19th century Art Nouveau building, Suite Hotel 200m zum Prater is located in Vienna's vibrant 2nd district, just a 5 to 10-minute walk from the city centre. Free wired internet is available in the lobby and the rooms come with free WiFi. Enjoying a quiet location, all rooms are equipped with a seating area, cable TV, a work desk and a private bathroom. The Suite Hotel is 200 metres from the famous Vienna Prater with its large Ferris wheel. Tram line 1 and bus lines 4A and 80A stop 100 metres away. Guests can reach Vienna’s main sights such as the famous St. Stephen’s Cathedral and the Opera within a 20-minute tram ride.

name: Hotel Pension Andreas
description: HPA Hotel Andreas is a traditional bed and breakfast in a quiet and very central location right behind the Town Hall, in Vienna’s 8th district. The Rathaus Underground Station (line U2) is just 200 metres away and the city centre is a 5 to 10-minute walk away. The newly renovated rooms offer a shower, toilet, TV, and safe. WiFi is available in the rooms free of charge. Hotel Andreas is located close to the Vienna University and the major museums, only a few minutes’ walk from the Ringstraße. Tickets for the nearby parking garage at Otto-Wagner-Platz are available at the reception of HPA Hotel Andreas.

name: Andaz Vienna Am Belvedere - a concept by Hyatt
description: Located in Vienna, 600 metres from Museum of Military History, Andaz Vienna Am Belvedere - a concept by Hyatt provides accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. Conveniently set in the 10. Favoriten district, this hotel features a bar, as well as a sauna and a spa centre. The accommodation offers room service, an ATM and currency exchange for guests. At the hotel each room includes air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Each room has a kettle, while selected rooms have a kitchen with a fridge, a dishwasher and a stovetop. At Andaz Vienna Am Belvedere - a concept by Hyatt every room is equipped with bed linen and towels. A continental, American or vegetarian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Languages spoken at the reception include Arabic, German, English and French. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Belvedere Palace, Vienna Main Railway Station and Karlskirche. The nearest airport is Vienna International Airport, 17 km from Andaz Vienna Am Belvedere - a concept by Hyatt.

name: Senator Hotel Vienna
description: Only a 12-minute tram ride from the centre of Vienna, the Town Hall and Vienna University, Senator Hotel Vienna offers free WiFi, a 24-hour bar, and fully air-conditioned rooms with a flat-screen satellite TV. Each of the spacious rooms has a safe and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. The Senator Hotel's bar serves a selection of Austrian wines, draught beer, and other drinks. A wide range of different restaurants is available nearby. Many typical wine taverns (Heurigen) and vineyards at the city’s green edge are just a few minutes away by tram. From the Rosensteingasse stop, tram line 43 goes directly to the centre and tram line 9 gets you to the Westbahnhof Train Station. A public indoor pool is a 5-minute walk away.

name: Hotel Viktoria
description: Located very close to Schönbrunn Palace, Hotel Viktoria is only a 10-minute underground ride away from Vienna’s centre. It offers free Wi-Fi and has a free PC in the lobby. This historic building from the late 19th century offers individually furnished rooms with satellite TV. The entire hotel is non-smoking. The main entrance of Schönbrunn Palace and the Schönbrunn Zoo are only a few minutes’ walk away from Hotel Viktoria. The Hietzing underground station (line U4) is only 100 metres away from Hotel Viktoria and provides direct connections to the city centre near the opera. An underground car park is a 2-minute walk away from Hotel Viktoria.

name: Pension Stadthalle
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including free WiFi and a flat-screen TV, as well as daily housekeeping and towels. Other amenities include hypo-allergenic bedding, a hair dryer, tour/ticket assistance, and luggage storage.Expedia

name: Rioca Vienna Posto 1
description: Situated 2.3 km from Kunst Haus Wien - Museum Hundertwasser, Rioca Vienna Posto 1 features accommodation with a bar and a garden. The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchenette with a dishwasher, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, and a private bathroom with shower and a hairdryer. A continental breakfast is available each morning at the aparthotel. Rioca Vienna Posto 1 offers a terrace. Vienna Prater is 2.6 km from Rioca Vienna Posto 1, while Messe Wien is 4.5 km from the property. St. Stephen's Cathedral is 3 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Vienna International Airport, 20 km from the aparthotel.

name: Hotel Pension Museum
description: Enjoying a very central yet quiet location right behind the Volkstheater and next to the Museumsquartier, Hotel Pension Museum offers comfortable rooms and a stylish ambience in the heart of Vienna. The Ringstraße boulevard is just a 5-minutes walk away and you can find lots of restaurants in the immediate surroundings. This hotel offers comfortable rooms with modern bathrooms, cable TV with 40 different channels, and restored parquet floors. For all lovers of culture and art, the location of the hotel behind the famous Volkstheater and opposite the Museum Quarter and the 2 big museums (Museum of Fine Arts and Museum of Natural History) is ideal. Vienna’s biggest shopping street, the Mariahilfer Strasse, is only 900 metres away from the hotel. The Hotel Pension Museum is easily accessible by public transport (underground lines U2 and U3, tram line 49 and bus line 48A).

name: Henriette Stadthotel Vienna
description: Just steps away from the Nestroyplatz Underground Station, Henriette Stadthotel Vienna is 2 stops from Saint Stephen’s Cathedral in the centre of Vienna. The Prater Amusement Park is a 10-minute walk away. WiFi is provided free of charge. The spacious and bright rooms feature air conditioning, a flat-screen TV, a seating area, and a bathroom with hairdryer. Henriette Stadthotel Vienna serves a rich breakfast buffet and offers a 24-hour reception. The Vienna International Centre and the Messe Wien exhibition centre are just a short underground ride away.

name: Hotel Rathaus Wein & Design
description: Hotel Rathaus - Wein & Design is located in Vienna’s 8th district and has an extensive wine list with over 450 top Austrian wines. Each room is dedicated to a specific Austrian winemaker and offers some of its best-selling wines in the minibar. It offers free WiFi and a 24-hour reception. Units at Hotel Rathaus - Wein & Design are spacious and have modern furnishings and come with air conditioning and a private bathroom. Double rooms have a minibar stocked with Austria’s top wines, and WiFi is available free of charge in all units. The hotel's signature room, the Junior Suite, offers Scandinavian lifestyle, including a boxspring bed from Hästens. A breakfast buffet is available every morning including regional specialties, antipasti and a broad selection of cheese. Freshly prepared egg dishes can be requested. Also, guests can choose a small breakfast which offers coffee or tea and a croissant. Vienna’s city centre and the Rathaus Metro Station are both a 5-minute walk away. A few of the city’s attractions can be reached on foot within 10 minutes, and include several theatres, the Museum of Modern Art and St. Stephen’s Cathedral. A multi-storey car park is located opposite Hotel Rathaus - Wein & Design, and charges are applicable there.

name: Ibis Budget Wien Sankt Marx
description: Stay at the ibis budget Wien Sankt Marx in one of our modern Double or Twin Rooms with flat-screen TV, shower and WC, and air conditioning. The hotel is easily accessible from the A23 highway. There is a subway station just 5 minutes' walk away, and the city center is 10 minutes away. Large indoor car park available at low prices. Free WIFI throughout the hotel, free Internet corner and our great value, all-you-can-eat buffet breakfast awaits you every morning.accorhotels.com

name: Appartement-Hotel an der Riemergasse
description: Appartements An der Riemergasse is located in a restored Art Nouveau building in Vienna's first district, a 3-minute walk from St. Stephen's Cathedral and the Kärntner Straße shopping street. All apartments have free internet access and stand out for their elegant ambience and original colour concepts. All have a completely equipped modern kitchenette or kitchen and satellite TV. Breakfast is available in a traditional Viennese café nearby. If ordered the day before, it can also be delivered directly to the apartment every morning. A 24-hour concierge service is available on request. The Stubentor Underground Station and the City Airport Train link are only a short walk away from the Riemergasse Apartments.

name: Grand Hotel Wien
description: The Grand Hotel Wien is located just off the famous Ring Strasse, moments away from the world-renowned Vienna State Opera and the elegant shopping mile of Kaerntner Strasse. Positioned in the central heart of the city, the hotel is a short 35-minute drive from the airport, and a five-minute walk from the Hauptbahnhof and Wien Mitte train stations Throughout Autumn and Winter, the Grand Hotel’s visitors flock to the nearby Christmas markets and traditional coffee houses for warming refreshments, decadent cakes and a special taste of historic Vienna An important part of the city since 1870, The Grand Hotel Wien is famed for exquisite hospitality and refined luxury. Featuring five restaurants and bars, a state-of-the-art spa, an expansive ballroom and 12 meeting and event rooms, it is perfect for relaxing city breaks, business trips, conferences and romantic escapes.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Austria Trend Hotel Savoyen Vienna
description: Formerly the historic Austrian State Print, the Austria Trend Hotel Savoyen Vienna impresses with its perfect blend of classical and modern architecture. 266 rooms and 43 suites invite you to feel at home among the elegant and modern architecture and tasteful design.The daylight-bathed atrium is the focal point of Savoyen Hotel. From here, our guests can access the 309 rooms & suites, the fitness and wellness area and Viennas largest hotel ballroom, measuring a total of 1056 m the ideal venue for events and meetings.Have a pleasant stay at the Austria Trend Hotel Savoyen Vienna and enjoy a journey trough several important epochs of a lively metropoles history exactly where prestigious villas used to impress at ancient times.iHotelier/iStay

name: Stanys Das Apartmenthotel
description: Just a 5-minute walk from the Westbahnhof Train Station, Stanys - Das Apartmenthotel is located on the Mariahilfer Straße shopping street. Free WiFi is available, secure parking spaces are available at a surcharge in the courtyard and a charging station for e-bikes and electric vehicles is featured. The spacious, individually designed rooms and apartments include cable TV, a refrigerator, a coffee maker, an electric kettle, and a bathroom with hairdryer. Some have a kitchenette and a balcony or terrace. A Viennese breakfast is provided every morning in the self-service lounge of the Stanys. Drinks are available at the bar. The Staglgasse Tram Stop is right outside and provides direct connections to Schönbrunn Palace, which can also be reached in a 25-minute walk. The centre of Vienna is just 5 underground stops away from the Westbahnhof, which includes stops of underground lines U3 and U6.

name: Flemings Hotel Wien-Stadthalle (former Flemings Conference Wien)
description: Imperial splendour and United Nations city, wine taverns and Hip-Hop: Vienna lives from its contradictions. It is good if one can rely on the typical Flemings ambience and atmosphere! The renowned Mariahilfer Strasse shopping mall is situated very close to the hotel and the Westbahnhof (Railway Station West) is only a few steps away. Enjoy Flemings culinary delights in peace, satisfy the in-between hunger pangs quickly and tastily: Flemings Brasserie & Wine Bar offers a special mix of French brasserie and delicatessen, a great deal of pleasure for all tastes. The conference area of 889 m with 11 multifunctional meeting rooms is the top address for congresses all types of events.In order to guarantee you a safe stay in our hotels, we implemented a significantly strengthened security concept. This includes, among other things, exclusively cashless payment and the closing of the minibar in the room. Drinks can be purchased at the reception instead.iHotelier/iStay

name: Rainers Hotel Vienna
description: Rainers Hotel Vienna is located a 10-minute ride by public transport from Vienna's centre and the State Opera. It features air-conditioned rooms, a restaurant, free WiFi, 2 iMac computers with free internet in the lobby, and private parking on-site. The elegant rooms at Rainers Hotel feature a flat-screen satellite TV, a safe with a charger for laptops and mobile phones, and free tea and coffee-making facilities.
