Rainers Restaurant serves Austrian and international cuisine and fine Austrian wines. Guests can relax on the summer terrace. Breakfast is available every day from 06:30 to 10:00. A wide range of international snacks and cocktails, as well as Dazn is available in Rainers Sportsbar. The Keplerplatz Underground Station (line U1) is 900 metres away and provides direct connections to the city centre. Meidling Train Station can be reached by S-Bahn trains in 5 minutes. Vienna Main Railway Station is 1 stop away. Vienna International Center and Austria Center Vienna are a 10-minute underground ride away. Vienna Airport is a 25-minute drive away from Rainers Hotel. The fastest and most direct way to get to the city center is by tram 1 or 62. The station is 400 m from the hotel.

name: Austria Trend Hotel Schloss Wilhelminenberg
description: Situated on the north-western outskirts of Vienna, surrounded by a 120,000 m park, Hotel Schloss Wilhelminenberg is in a dreamlike location on the edge of the Vienna Woods.50 elegant maisonette rooms on two floors, 33 standard rooms and four elegant junior suites are perfect for relaxation and wellbeing in a fairytale setting.iHotelier/iStay

name: Hotel MOTTO
address: Mariahilfer Strasse 71a, Eingang: Schadekgasse 20, 1060 Vienna, Vienna
description: We consider ourselves a green lifestyle hotel with aspirational design standards. Every room is amply decorated with plants, and lush greenery adorns the exterior facade as well, creating a welcoming atmosphere inside and out.The hotel rooms as well as the public spaces are small masterpieces where the Parisian flair of the 1920s meets modern Viennese lifestyle and Scandinavian coziness. Fabric-covered walls with floral patterns and custom-made lampshades, rugs and tiles by the renowned Arkan Zeytinoglu Architects provide a perfect setting for the unique vintage furniture. Striking artwork by Andrea Ferolla on the walls of the lobby and the restaurant round out the overall experience and raise comfort to a new level.Tailored details for our guests include the cocktail mini-bars and Saint Charles natural cosmetics in the bathrooms.The neighborhood of the hotel is among the trendiest areas of the city. Vienna's 6th and 7th districts are home to creative souls and urban lifestyles. From Mariahilfer Strae to Spittelberg and MuseumsQuartier, one local hotspot follows the next. Here you will find a paradise of cozy cafs, chic bars, local designers, and cool galleries: a bohemian district with a laid-back attitude and open to everybody.Hotel MOTTO cooperates with numerous local partners in the vicinity of the hotel. This way, we can offer our guests a diverse range of services and also accommodate individual wishes. On request, we organize private yoga and boxing sessions, private shopping tours and more.iHotelier/iStay

name: Hotel Bergwirt Schönbrunn
description: The family-run Hotel Bergwirt Schönbrunn enjoys a privileged location directly next to Schönbrunn Gardens and the ORF centre (TV station). It offers rooms with free Wi-Fi, cable TV and a minibar. The unique character of the hotel, the informal atmosphere and the impressions of a beautiful city will make your visit an unforgettable experience. The hotel offers guests from all over the world traditional Viennese atmosphere, attentive service and the hospitality only a family-run hotel can give. By public transportation you can reach the city centre in 15 minutes. The bus stop is directly opposite the hotel.

name: Vienna Residence, Marina Tower - Danube
description: Providing river views, a garden and free WiFi, Vienna Residence, Marina Tower - Danube is located in Vienna, 1.1 km from Ernst Happel Stadium and 2.9 km from Messe Wien. Featuring a kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, each unit also comes with a satellite flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, wardrobe and a seating area with a sofa. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The aparthotel offers a sun terrace. A bicycle rental service is available at Vienna Residence, Marina Tower - Danube. Vienna Prater is 3.5 km from the accommodation, while Kunst Haus Wien - Museum Hundertwasser is 4.7 km away. The nearest airport is Vienna International Airport, 16 km from Vienna Residence, Marina Tower - Danube.

name: Superbude Wien Prater
description: Set in Vienna, Superbude Hotel Hostel Wien Prater features a roof terrace. The property is situated 100 metres from Messe Wien. Vienna Prater is 700 metres away and Kunst Haus Wien - Museum Hundertwasser is 1.1 km from the hotel. Superbude Hotel Hostel Wien Prater rooms offer private bathroom equipped with a shower, while selected rooms also offer a balcony. A breakfast buffet is available daily Monday-Friday from 07:00 to 11:00 and Saturdays & Sundays from 08:00 to 11:00 at "Restaurant NENI am Prater". The property also features a bar. Ernst Happel Stadium is 1.4 km from the hotel, while Austria Center Vienna is 2.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Vienna International Airport, 16 km from the property.

name: Intercityhotel Wien
description: Located next to West Train Station on Austria's longest shopping-mile the Mariahilfer Straße is the perfect place for your business- or city trip! Modern rooms offer highest comfort for your sleep and rest. The bright lobby welcomes you with cosy seating possibilities, working stations as well as complimentary cold and hot drinks. Discover on your city stroll the vibrant shopping streets of the 6th district, the MuseumsQuartier, the "Naschmarkt" as well as the city center with its museums, historical sights and culinary highlights of the traditional Viennese cuisine. The city centre and all attractions can be reached in just a few minutes by public transport. The IntercityHotel Wien is only steps away from the Westbahnhof (Western Train Station), the U3 and U6 underground lines, and many tram and bus lines. Free WiFi is available and high-speed internet access is possible for an additional cost.

name: Hilton Vienna Park
description: Home to Vienna's premier conference center, the Hilton Vienna hotel features 3,000 sq. m. of meeting space for 2-1800 participants with a choice of 21 meeting rooms. Set in the heart of Vienna, the hotel is just 16 minutes by direct train from Vienna International Airport. Try Austrian cuisine with a modern twist in LENZ – Social Dining restaurant or enjoy a drink in our urban bar, SELLENY’S. Work out in the well-equipped gym or unwind with the sauna, steam bath and relaxation area at the Hilton Vienna hotel. All 663 Hilton Guest Rooms feature park or city views and WiFi. Executive Rooms enjoy Executive Lounge access with free continental breakfast, snacks and drinks.Hilton
